Package com.fns.grivet.controller

Class ClassRegistryController

java.lang.Object
com.fns.grivet.controller.ClassRegistryController
@RefreshScope @RestController @RequestMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public class ClassRegistryController extends Object
Provides end-points for type definition and verification
Author:
Chris Phillipson
